Header: Accelerated development program from North to South
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe says that an accelerated development program will be implemented from Point Pedro to Dondra Head. The Prime Minister said this during a function in Kilinochchi.The Prime Minister who arrived at the Kilinochchi Campus of the Jaffna University, was warmly welcomed. The Prime Minister opened several buildings built at Kilinochchi Campus at a cost of 5,000 million rupees. Addressing the gathering Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe said that the present government would take all necessary measures to increase standards and quality of the universities.
